he Flame of Hope was a business located in Waterdeep during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.Eric L. Boyd (June 2005). City of Splendors Waterdeep. (Wizards of the Coast), p. 107. ISBN 0-7869-3693-2.
The building stood two stories tall.
Run by the candle artisan Jastra Blynthard, this shop offers all her creations as well as complementary items to shed light. # Ed Greenwood and Steven E. Schend (July 1994). “Campaign Guide”. City of Splendors (TSR, Inc), p. 92. ISBN 0-5607-6868-1.
The Flame of Hope was located in the central section of Waterdeeps Southern Ward on Tulmasters Street at the mouth of Sethmas Court.
